SELECT oeo.*, ui.name as username, ui.images AS userImages, oe.title, oe.location, oe.longitude, oe.latitude, oe.ticket_price, oe.event_date, oe.description FROM offline_event_orders oeo LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.id = oeo.user_id) LEFT JOIN offline_events oe ON (oe.id = oeo.event_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND oeo.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.title},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.username},'%')
ORDER BY created_at DESC
